group_1.textCenter: (The Kamihama Contemporary Art Museum@doesn't hold exhibits like this very often...)
(...so I haven't had many chances to@see antiques before.)
(I'm really happy I could come today.)

group_1.textRight: Shall we get going?
Would you like to take a little tea break?
There's a cafe I'd like to try.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, please!

group_1.textRight: It's this one.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Wow...it looks lovely!
I wonder what I should get...
And here we are!
I had a photo shoot here before.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Okay...

group_1.textLeft: The most popular dessert they offer is their@cake! There's only 20 slices a day!

group_1.textRight: Cool, got it. But...
Did I really need to come here with you?

group_1.textLeft: Hmph! I see you're a chef with no vision!
If you eat this masterpiece of a cake...
Maybe you'll get a burst of inspiration for@that new dish you've been thinking about!
Though I did also just want to come and eat@the cake again...
It'd be totally embarrassing to come back@alone.

group_1.textRight: Uhhh, you're thinking out loud again...

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, let's go!

group_1.textRight: You seemed very entranced by the cups in@that exhibit.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I was looking to see all the marks of@the potters who made them.

group_1.textRight: You really pay attention to the fine details.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I wouldn't say that...
It's just, I don't usually get the chance@to look at antiques, so I was curious.

group_1.textRight: You'd like to see more antiques then?
Oh, in that case, I know just the place!
Would you like me to show you where it is@after we finish up here?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I'm sorry.
I have to cook dinner tonight, so I really@need to get home.

group_1.textRight: Ah, okay... Another time, then.

group_1.textLeft: Definitely!

group_1.textRight: You must be a good cook, Mayu.

group_1.textLeft: Oh no, I'm certainly not!
I just started cooking to try and help my@mother out.

group_1.textRight: She must be proud of you.

group_1.textLeft: It's really nothing!
[chara:303201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Though, it's really nice of you to say so.
Huh? What was that just now?

group_1.textRight: Are you all right, Mayu?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, um, yes! I'm completely fine!

group_1.textRight: Mayu's very own home cooking...
I'm sure it's delicious!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you're too kind, really! I make all@kinds of mistakes.

group_1.textRight: Even so, I would eat up every last bite.

group_1.textLeft: Really?
That would make me very happy.
[chara:303201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I might end up liking you.
[chara:303201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eeek?!
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]UUUUUUGH!

group_1.textRight: Aren't you embarrassed, acting like this in@public?

group_1.textLeft: Honestly! "Oooh, I might end up liking you."@Pah!
Now I'm really ticked off!
Only one thing can calm me now.
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]I'll eat every piece of cake this cafe has!@All 20 slices!

group_1.textRight: They only allow one per customer.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so! Then give me yours!
*Munch* *Chew* *Chew*

group_1.textRight: Since you ate my slice there's no way@I can get any inspiration from it.
[chara:300901:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Now I really have no reason to be here...
You know you're going to pay the bill, right?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
